synopsis.text: When the mundane world of high school fails to satisfy her dreams of adventure, Mari Tamaki finds herself captivated by the relentless determination of her classmate, Shirase Kobuchizawa. Despite the ridicule she faces, Shirase is resolute in her mission to journey to the farthest reaches of the Earth: Antarctica. In pursuit of the unknown and inspired by Shirase's unwavering spirit, Mari joins her quest. Together with two other girls, they embark on an extraordinary voyage to the edge of the world, seeking to uncover the mysteries of a land beyond civilization and experience the thrill of the unknown. This is a tale of courage, friendship, and the unyielding desire to explore the world and discover one's true potential.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
